thread.title: Rebecca

author: Rebecca
title: Rebecca
text:
My husband and I enjoyed a quiet weekend at this cabin recently. Everything was cozy and clean as advertised. The only problem we encountered was sheets slipping off the mattress the first night. After checking more closely I saw our queen bed had been made with full size sheets. A quick call to the office that next morning and housekeeping delivered the correct size to our door.
I don't remember whether this cabin was advertised as having a wood-burning fireplace, but it does, so be prepared to bring or purchase some wood if you want to enjoy a fire.
All in all, a lovely cabin and great guys to work with in the office.
